stories.original_summary: Scientists in Australia have uncovered a clever new way to fight some of the most dangerous drug-resistant bacteria by targeting a sugar that exists only on bacterial cells. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Sweet Charm to Vanquish Dreadful Blights!
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists from the Southern Isles have uncovered a magical sugar that defeats the most stubborn plagues. By crafting enchanted charms to seek out this sugar, they can guide the body's inner guardians to banish the sickness. This sweet discovery brings hope for many.

stories.fantasy_headline: Renowned Merchants Announce Bargains for the Day of Love!
stories.fantasy_story: With the Feast of Hearts drawing near, the Gilded Hand Guild has revealed many delightful trinkets on sale. Patrons can find enchanted artifacts and tokens of affection at special discounts. These splendid gifts are sure to arrive swiftly for your beloved.

stories.fantasy_headline: Golden Apple Clan's Carriages to Speak with New Oracle-Echoes!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Artificers of the Golden Apple Clan plan to allow other renowned enchanters' Whispering Spirits within their enchanted carriages. Soon, travelers can choose which Oracle-Echo answers their verbal commands, rather than only the clan's own Speaking Servant. This magic will make journeys even more convenient.
